name: Slime Killer, 2 Hours arcade game (Alpha)
description:
Slime Killer is a arcade Tower defense game in first person, developed in 2 hours by CGN studios, a indie game developer actually with 2 members.

The game contains only one level and infinite score, it is just a pastime and was created just to test mechanics for future games.

Game Content:

-2 Kinds of Slimes.

-1 Kind of Cannon.

-Only one Map.

-Simple Menu.

-Gameplay Music.

Like our page: https://www.facebook.com/CGNStudios/?fref=ts

-CGN Studios.
